sentences.en: Amy sewed with outward meekness and inward rebellion till dusk.
sentences.cn: 阿密阳奉阴违地一直缝到黄昏.

sentences.en: But this is not the only way inward - looking strategies affect agriculture.
sentences.cn: 但这不是内向策略影响农业的唯一手段.

sentences.en: Dr. Bledsoe sat with a benign smile of inward concentration.
sentences.cn: 布莱索博士坐在椅子上,思想集中,脸上露出了一副宽厚的笑容.

sentences.en: Ethan Allen Hawley's quiet, dim, and inward day was gone.
sentences.cn: 伊坦·亚伦·郝雷那宁静 、 朦胧 、 内省的一天已经完结了.

sentences.en: He had an eager inward life with little enjoyment of tangible things.
sentences.cn: 他过去重视内心生活,以致在享受有形物质方面,未免有所疏忽.

sentences.en: He pushed open the front door, which swung inward with a groan.
sentences.cn: 他推开前门，门呀的一声向里开了。

sentences.en: Her calm expression hid her inward panic.
sentences.cn: 她平静的外表掩盖了内心的恐慌。

sentences.en: His face, as he turned it round, betrayed the inward shock.
sentences.cn: 她把脸转过来的时候, 暴露出了他内心的震惊.

sentences.en: Inward suffering is the worst of Nemesis.
sentences.cn: 内心的痛苦是最厉害的惩罚.

sentences.en: It'summoned him onward -- inward to the festival!
sentences.cn: 乐声召唤他向前进, 乐声 召唤他去赴宴!

sentences.en: Nothing could console her till the inward storm had had its way.
sentences.cn: 除了听任她的内心风暴发作下去,任怎样都安慰不了她.

sentences.en: The athlete takes off from one leg from an inward twist.
sentences.cn: 这名运动员向内转体一周单腿起跳。

sentences.en: The explorers discovered an inward passage.
sentences.cn: 探险队员发现了一条内部通道.
这是一条向里弯曲的曲线.

words.tran_cn: 心底的，内心深处的；最深的
内心的；最里面的，最深处的；秘密的
进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里
按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内
[计]向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的

trans.tran_cn: 向内的，内部的，本质上的，亲密的
trans.tran_en: felt or experienced in your own mind but not expressed to other people
If something moves or faces inward, it moves or faces toward the inside or centre of something
